GSD.description:
ALSA: timer: Use deferred fasync helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.326 by commit 900c508f6d15150396060e96fbb969df9fd54b10. For more details please see the references link.
